widget.name: Web view
widget.description: Display an external web page or load custom HTML.

property.caption: URL
property.description: The URL of the web page that is loaded.

property.caption: Content
property.description: The HTML content to be rendered. This will precede URL

property.caption: On message
property.description: Used to communicate from the loaded webpage to the native app trough window.ReactNativeWebView.postMessage([string])

property.caption: Message attribute
property.description: The attribute where the input message will be stored. This can be used to read the input in the onMessage event.

property.caption: User agent
property.description: A custom user agent string will be included with the request.

property.caption: Open links externally
property.description: If true, links embedded in source document will be opened in external browser instead of inside this widget.
